title: Douglas Adams - The Hitchhicker's Guide To The Galaxy.epub
description: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy is a comedy science fiction series created by Douglas Adams. In The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy (published in 1979), the characters visit the legendary planet Magrathea, home to the now-collapsed planet-building industry, and meet Slartibartfast, a planetary coastline designer who was responsible for the fjords of Norway. Through archival recordings, he relates the story of a race of hyper-intelligent pan-dimensional beings who built a computer named Deep Thought to calculate the Answer to the Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything.
